qas.question: Safety reasons may be why someone wears this type of clothing.
Leotards are an example of what type of garment?
What's an example of a form fitting garment?
What type of sport is wrestling considered?
What physical activities do not require special clothing?
What the spandex not soak up?

plausible_answers.text: shorts, T-shirts, tennis shirts, leotards, tracksuits, and trainers

qas.question: What are not common sports governments

context: <b5_0>Most sports<b5_0/> and physical activities are practiced wearing <a0_0>special<a0_0/> clothing, for practical, comfort or safety reasons. Common <a1_0>sportswear<a1_0/> garments include <b7_0>shorts, T-shirts, tennis shirts, leotards, tracksuits, and trainers<b7_0/>. Specialized garments include wet suits (for swimming, diving or surfing), salopettes (for skiing) and leotards (for gymnastics). Also, spandex materials are often used as base layers to soak up <a2_0><b6_0>sweat<b6_0/><a2_0/>. <a3_0>Spandex<a3_0/> is also preferable for <a4_0>active<a4_0/> sports that require form fitting garments, such as volleyball, wrestling, track & field, dance, gymnastics and swimming.
